pullRequest.title: Update the document related to RISC-V
pullRequest.bodyText:
The updated mainly includes the library required for the compilation
with the DDR enabled plus the adjusted PATH in the configuration.
Signed-off-by: Cheng Jin jincheng@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText:
The grammar here needs fixing; it's unclear whether you're advising

removing /usr/lib64/ccache from the PATH environment variable, or
removing the /usr/lib64/ccache directory from the file system.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1295,6 +1295,9 @@ e.g.
 export JAVA_HOME=/<path_to>/<the_cross_built_jdk>
 export PATH="$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH"
 ```
+:bulb:
+Please remove `/usr/lib64/ccache` if exists in the PATH it as `/usr/lib64/ccache/gcc` is a symbolic link to `ccache` which is not supported in the compilation of OpenJDK.

commit.message:
Update the document related to RISC-V

The updated mainly includes the library required for the compilation
with the DDR enabled plus the adjusted PATH in the configuration.

Signed-off-by: Cheng Jin <jincheng@ca.ibm.com>
